definition: in a few days/one of these days

sun/day/date, day of the month

sentences.english: On the operation, the space continues to hold, days short on high short.
sentences.chinese: 操作上，空单继续持有，日内短线逢高做空为主。

sentences.english: We a ume we shall receive an advice within a few days.
sentences.chinese: 我们相信日内可望收到银行通知。

sentences.english: This train ticket is valid for three days.
We will cover system testing, day-trading, and a new method for placing stops.
sentences.chinese: 我会谈到系统测试，日内交易，新的止损方法。

sentences.english: He swore that he would die within 7 days if it were true he gained his assets illegally.
sentences.chinese: 他信还发誓如果其资产证实为非法所得，7日内横死。

sentences.english: In the event of violating the traffic security rules, the Leasee shall accept the punishment within 5 days of notification.
sentences.chinese: 违反交通安全法规时，应在被告知的5日内接受处罚。

sentences.english: Article 13 The law enforcement organs shall turn over the confiscated income to the treasury within 4 days therefrom.
sentences.chinese: 第十三条执法机关应当在4日内将罚没收入上缴财政。

sentences.english: Furthermore, FFF regression works well in determining the intra-day periodicity.
sentences.chinese: FFF回归能较好地确定日内周期因子。

sentences.english: Fluctuation of cotton days and days to follow up the United States for consequent transactions.
sentences.chinese: 日内以跟进美棉日内波动而进行顺向交易。

sentences.english: MOFTEC shall decide within 45 days on approval or rejection.
sentences.chinese: 对外贸易经济合作部在45日内决定批准或不批准。

sentences.english: The 50% payment must be paid off within the 7 days.
sentences.chinese: 其中50%的定金请于定展位日起7日内付讫。

sentences.english: Such student should register change information within 10 days.
sentences.chinese: 学生需自变更之日起10日内到外管处办理变更登记。
